wikipedia_page.main: David Stewart (13 December 1869 – 3 August 1933) was a Scottish footballer who played as a defender or half back.

response: *David Stewart, Earl of Strathearn (1357–c. 1386), Scottish magnate

*David Stewart (songwriter and producer), English songwriter, record producer and musician most famous for producing "Dynamite" by the South Korean band BTS
